subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that defines the Gantt UI component's configuration properties.

subMembers.name: allowSelection
subMembers.description: Specifies whether users can select tasks in the Gantt.

subMembers.name: columns
subMembers.description: An array of columns in the Gantt.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text displayed in column cells.

subMembers.name: filterOperations
subMembers.description: Specifies available filter operations. Applies if [allowFiltering] is **true** and the [filterRow] is visible.

subMembers.name: filterValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the column's filter value displayed in the [filter row].

subMembers.name: contextMenu
subMembers.description: Configures the context menu settings.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to the data source which contains dependencies.

subMembers.name: dependencies
subMembers.description: Configures dependencies.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides keys for dependencies.

subMembers.name: predecessorIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides predecessor IDs.

subMembers.name: successorIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides successor IDs.

subMembers.name: typeExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides dependency types.

subMembers.name: allowDependencyAdding
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can add [dependencies].

subMembers.name: allowDependencyDeleting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can delete [dependencies].

subMembers.name: allowResourceAdding
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can add [resources].

subMembers.name: allowResourceDeleting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can delete [resources].

subMembers.name: allowResourceUpdating
subMembers.description: For internal use only.

subMembers.name: allowTaskAdding
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can add [tasks].

subMembers.name: allowTaskDeleting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can delete [tasks].

subMembers.name: allowTaskResourceUpdating
subMembers.description: Specifies whether users can update a [task's resources].

subMembers.name: allowTaskUpdating
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can update [tasks].

subMembers.name: editing
subMembers.description: Configures edit properties.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can edit tasks, resources and dependencies.

subMembers.name: endDateRange
subMembers.description: Specifies the end date of the date interval in the Gantt chart.

subMembers.name: filterRow
subMembers.description: Configures filter row settings.

subMembers.name: firstDayOfWeek
subMembers.description: Specifies the first day of a week.

subMembers.name: headerFilter
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter settings.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to the data source, which contains resource assignments.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides keys for resource assignments.

subMembers.name: resourceAssignments
subMembers.description: Configures resource assignments.

subMembers.name: resourceIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides resource IDs.

subMembers.name: taskIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides task IDs.

subMembers.name: colorExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides resources' color.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to the data source, which contains resources.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides keys for resources.

subMembers.name: resources
subMembers.description: Configures task resources.

subMembers.name: textExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides resource texts.

subMembers.name: rootValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the root task's identifier.

subMembers.name: rtlEnabled
subMembers.description: Switches the UI component to a right-to-left representation.

subMembers.name: scaleType
subMembers.description: Specifies the zoom level of tasks in the Gantt chart.

subMembers.name: max
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum zoom level of tasks in the Gantt chart.

subMembers.name: min
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum zoom level of tasks in the Gantt chart.

subMembers.name: scaleTypeRange
subMembers.description: Configures zoom range settings.

subMembers.name: selectedRowKey
subMembers.description: Allows you to select a row or determine which row is selected.

subMembers.name: showDependencies
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display [dependencies] between tasks.

subMembers.name: showResources
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display [task resources].

subMembers.name: showRowLines
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show/hide horizontal faint lines that separate tasks.

subMembers.name: sorting
subMembers.description: Configures sort settings.

subMembers.name: startDateRange
subMembers.description: Specifies the start date of the date interval in the Gantt chart.

subMembers.name: stripLines
subMembers.description: Configures strip lines.

subMembers.name: taskContentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskContentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskContentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies custom content for the task.

subMembers.name: taskListWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the task list in pixels.

subMembers.name: taskProgressTooltipContentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskProgressTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskProgressTooltipContentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskProgressTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskProgressTooltipContentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies custom content for the tooltip that displays the task's progress while the progress handler is resized in the UI.

subMembers.name: taskTimeTooltipContentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskTimeTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskTimeTooltipContentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskTimeTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskTimeTooltipContentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies custom content for the tooltip that displays the task's start and end time while the task is resized in the UI.

subMembers.name: taskTitlePosition
subMembers.description: Specifies a task's title position.

subMembers.name: taskTooltipContentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskTooltipContentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [taskTooltipContentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: taskTooltipContentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies custom content for the task tooltip.

subMembers.name: colorExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides tasks' color.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to the data source which contains tasks.

subMembers.name: endExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides tasks' end dates.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides keys for tasks.

subMembers.name: parentIdExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides tasks' parent IDs.

subMembers.name: progressExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides tasks' progress.

subMembers.name: startExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides tasks' start dates.

subMembers.name: tasks
subMembers.description: Configures tasks.

subMembers.name: titleExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides task titles.

subMembers.name: toolbar
subMembers.description: Configures toolbar settings.

subMembers.name: autoUpdateParentTasks
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to recalculate the parent task's duration and progress when its child tasks are modified.

subMembers.name: enablePredecessorGap
subMembers.description: Specifies whether users can move or resize a predecessor to change a gap before a successor according to the [dependency rules].

subMembers.name: validateDependencies
subMembers.description: Enables [task dependencies] validation.

subMembers.name: validation
subMembers.description: Configures validation properties.

properties.name: dxGantt
properties.description: The Gantt is a UI component that displays the task flow and dependencies between tasks.

Methods.name: assignResourceToTask(resourceKey_taskKey)
Methods.description: Assigns a resource to a task.

Methods.name: expandAllToLevel(level)
Methods.description: Expands all tasks down to the specified hierarchical level.

Methods.name: getTaskResources(key)
Methods.description: Gets resources assigned to a task.

Methods.name: getVisibleDependencyKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the keys of the visible dependencies.

Methods.name: getVisibleResourceAssignmentKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the keys of the visible resource assignments.

Methods.name: getVisibleResourceKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the keys of the visible resources.

Methods.name: getVisibleTaskKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the keys of the visible tasks.

Methods.name: refresh()
Methods.description: Reloads data and repaints the Gantt component.

Methods.name: scrollToDate(date)
Methods.description: Scrolls the Gantt chart to the specified date.

Methods.name: unassignAllResourcesFromTask(taskKey)
Methods.description: Removes all resources from the task.

Methods.name: unassignResourceFromTask(resourceKey_taskKey)
Methods.description: Removes a resource from the task.

Methods.name: updateDimensions()
Methods.description: Updates the dimensions of the UI component contents.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onContextMenuPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: onCustomCommand
Events.description: A function that is executed after a custom command item was clicked. Allows you to implement a custom command's functionality.

Events.name: onDependencyDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a dependency is deleted.

Events.name: onDependencyDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a dependency is deleted.

Events.name: onDependencyInserted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a dependency is inserted.

Events.name: onDependencyInserting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a dependency is inserted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onResourceAssigned
Events.description: A function that is executed when a resource is assigned to a task.

Events.name: onResourceAssigning
Events.description: A function that is executed before a resource is assigned to a task.

Events.name: onResourceDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a resource is deleted.

Events.name: onResourceDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a resource is deleted.

Events.name: onResourceInserted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a resource is inserted.

Events.name: onResourceInserting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a resource is inserted.

Events.name: onResourceManagerDialogShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the Resource Manager dialog is shown.

Events.name: onResourceUnassigned
Events.description: A function that is executed when a resource is unassigned from a task.

Events.name: onResourceUnassigning
Events.description: A function that is executed before a resource is unassigned from a task.

Events.name: onScaleCellPrepared
Events.description: A function that is executed before a scale cell is prepared.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after users select a task or clear its selection.

Events.name: onTaskClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user clicks a task.

Events.name: onTaskDblClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user double-clicks a task.

Events.name: onTaskDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a task is deleted.

Events.name: onTaskDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a task is deleted.

Events.name: onTaskEditDialogShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the edit dialog is shown.

Events.name: onTaskInserted
Events.description: A function that is executed when a task is inserted.

Events.name: onTaskInserting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a task is inserted.

Events.name: onTaskMoving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a task is moved.

Events.name: onTaskUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed when a task is updated.

Events.name: onTaskUpdating
Events.description: A function that is executed before a task is updated.

Events.name: contextMenuPreparing
Events.description: Raised before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: customCommand
Events.description: Raised after a custom command item was clicked.

Events.name: dependencyDeleted
Events.description: Raised when a dependency is deleted.

Events.name: dependencyDeleting
Events.description: Raised before a dependency is deleted.

Events.name: dependencyInserted
Events.description: Raised when a dependency is inserted.

Events.name: dependencyInserting
Events.description: Raised before a dependency is inserted.

Events.name: resourceAssigned
Events.description: Raised when a resource is assigned to a task.

Events.name: resourceAssigning
Events.description: Raised before a resource is assigned to a task.

Events.name: resourceDeleted
Events.description: Raised when a resource is deleted.

Events.name: resourceDeleting
Events.description: Raised before a resource is deleted.

Events.name: resourceInserted
Events.description: Raised when a resource is inserted.

Events.name: resourceInserting
Events.description: Raised before a resource is inserted.

Events.name: resourceManagerDialogShowing
Events.description: Raised before the Resource Manager dialog is shown.

Events.name: resourceUnassigned
Events.description: Raised when a resource is unassigned from a task.

Events.name: resourceUnassigning
Events.description: Raised before a resource is unassigned from a task.

Events.name: scaleCellPrepared
Events.description: Raised before a scale cell is prepared.

Events.name: selectionChanged
Events.description: Raised after users select a task or clear its selection.

Events.name: taskClick
Events.description: Raised when a user clicks a task.

Events.name: taskDblClick
Events.description: Raised when a user double-clicks a task.

Events.name: taskDeleted
Events.description: Raised when a task is deleted.

Events.name: taskDeleting
Events.description: Raised before a task is deleted.

Events.name: taskEditDialogShowing
Events.description: Raised before the edit dialog is shown.

Events.name: taskInserted
Events.description: Raised when a task is inserted.

Events.name: taskInserting
Events.description: Raised before a task is inserted.

Events.name: taskMoving
Events.description: Raised before a task is moved.

Events.name: taskUpdated
Events.description: Raised when a task is updated.

Events.name: taskUpdating
Events.description: Raised before a task is updated.
